member.name: ACTRL_PROPERTY_ENTRYA
member.summary: Contains a list of access-control entries for an object or a specified property on an object.

member.name: ACTRL_PROPERTY_ENTRYA.lpProperty
member.summary: The GUID of a property on an object. Use the function to generate a string representation of a property GUID.

member.name: ACTRL_PROPERTY_ENTRYA.pAccessEntryList
member.summary: A pointer to an structure that contains a list of access-control entries.

summary.para: Flags that specify information about the pProperty property. This member can be 0 or the following value.

listheader.description: Protects the object or property from inheriting access-control entries.
